702483f-b.text:
9th Street, at the N. E. corner of Fourth Avenue, showing the St. Thomas Aquinas Roman Catholic Church. The edifice extends north to 8th Street and shows, at the N. E. corner of the latter, the St. Thomas Aquinas School. View 2 shows the Fourth Avenue side of the church,
viewing south from 8th Street.
July 4, 1930
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr

702483f-a.text:
9th Street, at the N. E. corner of Fourth Avenue, showing the St. Thomas Aquinas Roman Catholic Church. The edifice extends north to 8th Street and shows, at the N. E. corner of the latter, the St. Thomas Aquinas School. View 2 shows the Fourth Avenue side of the church,
viewing south from 8th Street.
July 4, 1930
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr

702485f-a.text:
271 to 283 (left to right) 9th Street, north side, between Fourth and Fifth Avenues. View 1 shows Nos. 271 and 273-275; view 2 shows 273 to 283.
June 14, 1940
P. L. Sperr

702485f-b.text:
271 to 283 (left to right) 9th Street, north side, between Fourth and Fifth Avenues. View 1 shows Nos. 271 and 273-275; view 2 shows 273 to 283.
June 14, 1940
P. L. Sperr

702484f-a.text:
9th Street, north side, west from (No. 271) a point midway between Third and Fourth Avenues, toward the former. The church is the St. Thomas Aquinas Roman Catholic Church.
June 14, 1940
P. L. Sperr

View 2 shows the same area, looking east along the north side of 9th Street, from (and across) Fourth Avenue.
April 21, 1941
